sn45.6:3.1: 6. Paṭhamaaññatarabhikkhusutta
sn45.6:4.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn45.6:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn45.6:4.5: Katamaṃ nu kho, bhante, brahmacariyaṃ, katamaṃ brahmacariyapariyosānan”ti?
sn45.6:5.1: “Ayameva kho, bhikkhu, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo brahmacariyaṃ, seyyathidaṃ—
sn45.6:5.4: Yo kho, bhikkhu, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo—
